alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 17 at 3:17AM EST until December 18 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Storm surge values of 2-3ft and large nearshore waves of 15-20ft may coincide with the Monday afternoon high tide to bring minor to moderate coastal flooding impacts. * WHERE...Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal Waldo Counties. * WHEN...Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/02 PM 11.1 1.4 0.7 1 None 18/03 AM 10.3 0.6 1.1 2 None 18/03 PM 12.6 2.9 2.6 3-4 Minor 19/04 AM 9.0 -0.7 -0.3 3-4 None 19/04 PM 9.8 0.1 0.2 3 None Bath ME MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/03 AM 7.0 -2.7 0.0 0 None 17/03 PM 8.4 -1.3 0.2 0 None 18/04 AM 7.8 -1.9 0.7 0 None 18/04 PM 10.4 0.7 2.5 0 None 19/05 AM 6.6 -3.1 -0.7 0 None 19/05 PM 7.5 -2.2 -0.1 0 None Boothbay Harbor ME MLLW Categories - Minor 13.0 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/02 PM 10.7 1.0 0.6 1-2 None 18/03 AM 10.0 0.3 1.1 2-3 None 18/03 PM 12.5 2.8 2.8 7-12 None 19/04 AM 8.7 -1.0 -0.3 7-8 None 19/04 PM 9.4 -0.3 0.1 5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
